name: Honor Dynasty
description:
Welcome to Honor Dysnasty.

Your kingdom needs you, to defend against the enemies with your abilities!
Fight with your enemies for glory and survive many waves

Features:

* You can build more than 6 types of towers
* You can update these towers
* Many waves that you must defend yourself
* More than 15 enemies, some with special abilities
* More than 4 maps and 3 of these for multiplayer
